item.title: Controller Runtime Bytes #1 (Ownership)
item.description: This is a series of mini blogs for documenting some of the controller runtime features. In Kubernetes, some objects are owner of other objects. For example, a ReplicaSet is the owner of a set of Pods. These owned objects are dependents of their owners. The dependents objects has references to all owners objects under metadata.ownerReferences field. A kubernetes custom resources can set itself as owner of the other resources, it creates as part of it’s reconciliation logic.
